Part 5.question_text: Not far _____ the train station lies Starlight Park, which is a popular destination for tourists and locals alike.
The sales director will give a brief talk _____ the keynote speaker is introduced.
The charity's new reading program is _____ to increase literacy rates in developing countries over the next ten years.
Engaging in social _____, Ms. Mason quickly expanded her network after moving to a new city.
Artists wanting to participate in the contest should submit their work by the _____ of June
Drake Pharmaceuticals is _____ to have world-renowned chemist Jonas Lund as its senior lab technician.
The Zans Corporation _____ manufacturing all of its luxury wallets and footwear domestically next year.
Some voters have a clear _____ for candidates who have practiced law.
The clerk said that _____ fifteen customers had been waiting outside the store for it to open.
The leaky faucet has been repaired, so visitors may _____ use the first-floor restroom.
The _____ of the disease can be significantly slowed by taking the medicine developed by Dr. Toft's team.
Unfortunately, when the hurricane hit the area, residents as well as public officials were _____ unprepared.
The company plans on _____ the salespeople for the expenses they incurred while attending the conference.
Ms. Carlton felt comfortable crossing the road because there were no vehicles coming in her _____.
_____ the television coverage of the general election, a number of high-profile candidates were interviewed live on air.
Mr. Hicks _____ seating near the stage in the concert hall for important clients.
Fritz Center, the venue _____ hosts the film industry's awards banquet, is undergoing an ambitious expansion project.
The monthly staff dinners give employees from different departments the chance to interact with _____ on a personal level.
Landlords are required to _____ with the regulations set by the Regional Department of Safe Housing.
A sturdy support beam was added to the first story of the building for _____ reasons.
Eco Unite is a non-profit organization _____ to educating the public about environmental issues.
It is essential that the logo for Prime Vitamins be integrated _____ all of its catalogs and mailings.
Despite receiving rejections from several major publishers, Ian Wright _____ to become a world-famous novelist.
Mr. Burrows was praised for creating _____ user manuals which can be easily understood.
Even though Ms. Garcia had a small account at the financial institution, the employee treated her _____ she were a major investor.
When you return an item by mail, be sure the receipt is _____ to the request form to expedite processing.
The witness saw only a _____ figure standing near the lamp post shortly before the crime was committed.
Ben Sanders _____ designed the suitcase to fold up easily for compact storage.
Because the weather was warmer than usual this summer, the crops _____ a few weeks early.
_____ auditing the financial records of Rockford Consulting, the accountant will submit an official report.
